document.full_text: innkeepers usa trust, the bankrupt manager of more than 70 hotels, gained court approval on friday of a plan to sell most of its properties to cerberus capital management  and chatham lodging trust  for $1.12 billion.
document.title: bankruptcy judge oks innkeepers $1.12 billion sale
lines_and_colors: innkeepers usa trust, the bankrupt manager of more than 70 hotels, gained court approval on friday of a plan to sell most of its properties to cerberus capital management  and chatham lodging trust  for $1.12 billion.
